content: Zariin triples average order value and increases customer engagement by 117% with Swirl Live Video Shopping.
P N Rao generated 22% growth in instore footfalls and 37% jump in sales during lockdown by partnering with Swirl to offer virtual shopping to its luxury customers.
Greenberry Organics boosts customer engagement by 70% and executed a successful launch of its new collection by partnering with Swirl.
BeChefâ€™s Add-to-Cart rates soared by a whopping 4.3X and conversion rate by 5.5%  when they collaborated with Swirl to run a video ad campaign.
